name: Malta Youth in Agriculture Foundation
goal:
The Objectives of the Foundation are:

• To protect and ensure the best interests of young farmers in the Maltese Islands on legislative, competitive and marketing fronts,

• To promote all aspects of sustainable and diversified agriculture in the Maltese Islands,

• To cooperate with stakeholders on matters affecting Maltese agriculture,

• To serve as a medium for the exchange of ideas and for the dissemination of information pert agriculture issues,

• To enhance the concept of fairly market place.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Public Health, Youth
